articles.title: FM Spokesman Slams U.S. State Secretary's Provocative Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Slams U.S. State Secretary's Provocative Remarks against DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday in connection with the fact that the U.S. State secretary let out provocative remarks slandering the dignified government of the DPRK.
					 U.S. State Secretary Kerry called the DPRK "illegal and non-legitimate regime" on Oct. 21.
					
					 He has malignantly slandered the DPRK as "a rogue state" and "den of evils" since the first day of his office. Now with the tenure of his office almost running out he is still spewing out invective against the DPRK, not discarding his bad habit. This is nothing but a rubbish of the guy who has become helpless in the face of the total bankruptcy of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Obama group including Kerry is a herd of illegal gangsters as they overthrew by force the legitimate governments of sovereign states and killed tens of thousands of innocent people in different parts of the world for the mere reason that they courted displeasure.
					
					 But for the U.S. ruled by such ignorant political hooligans as Kerry, the world would have become a pacific place better to live. This is the unanimous comment of the overwhelming majority of the world people.
					
					 No matter how desperately the Obama group may work to brand the DPRK as illegal, it will not undermine the strategic position of the DPRK which is demonstrating its dignity and might all over the world with the might of the single-minded unity and tremendous national power.
					
					 The DPRK will dynamically advance along the road already chosen by itself no matter what Kerry may say.

articles.title: Third Meeting of Korea-China Border Joint Commission Held
articles.content:
Third Meeting of Korea-China Border Joint Commission Held
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Third Meeting of the Korea-China Border Joint Commission was held here on Tuesday.
					 Present at the meeting from the DPRK side were Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs who doubles as senior delegate of the DPRK side to the commission, and officials concerned and from the opposite side were a Chinese delegation led by Liu Zhenmin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs who doubles as senior delegate of the Chinese side to the commission, and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Discussed at the meeting were the issues arising in the work of border relations since the Second Meeting of the Commission and issues of building new border bridges and setting up new border passing spots in the future.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Friendship Tower
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Friendship Tower on Tuesday, the 66th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Hong Son Ok, secretary general of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, and others.
					
					 Also present there were Li Jinjun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy, a Chinese delegation led by Liu Zhenmin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, who are here to take part in the 3rd meeting of the Korea-China Border Joint Commission.
					
					 A wreath was laid before the tower in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Wreath were also laid in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of External Economic Relations, the Ministry of Culture, the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Pyongyang City People's Committee, the Chinese Embassy here, the Chinese delegation, etc.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers.
					
					 Wreaths were laid before the Cemetery of Martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers and graves of martyrs in Hyongjesan District of Pyongyang, Kaesong City, Anju City, Hoechang County and other places on the same day.

articles.title: Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bouquets before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik and the graves of Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 After visiting the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum they went to the old home in Mangyongdae. Looking round historical relics preserved in the thatched house, they grasped the revolutionary career of the President.
					
					 They visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong. They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and made bows to her before going round the cemetery.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					
					 They made bows to the statue of the President waving back to the columns of the military parade at the square for celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid tribute to the victors of the great years before going round several rooms of the museum.
					
					 They toured the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War, the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, the Sci-Tech Complex and the National House of Class Education.
					
					 They planted trees at the Arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site.

articles.title: Russian Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Do Friendship Labor
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy did a friendship labor at the DPRK-Russia Friendship Kochang Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Chollima District on Tuesday.
					 They helped the farmers in doing farming. During a break they talked with officials of the farm.
					
					 They handed over aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Girls Footballers Welcomed by Pyongyangites
articles.content:
Girls Footballers Welcomed by Pyongyangites
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The girls footballers of the DPRK came back home Tuesday after winning the title of the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup.
					 Pyongyang International Airport and the route leading to Ryonmot-dong, Ryonghung Crossroads, Kaesonmun Street, Changjon Crossroads were crowded with people from all walks of life and school youth and children with bouquets in their hands.
					
					 They were greeted at the airport by Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ryong Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, and officials concerned.
					
					 Sportspersons and families of players put garlands around the necks of coaches and players and presented them with bouquets, congratulating them.
					
					 When a large float van carrying the players started at the entrance to Ryonmot-dong, seas of flowers presented on the route.
					
					 The players laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Flood-hit Historic Site Restored in Hoeryong of DPRK
articles.content:
Flood-hit Historic Site Restored in Hoeryong of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Mangyang Ferry Revolutionary Site has been restored to its original state in Hoeryong City, one of the flood-hit areas in North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 Soldiers of the Korean People's Army started the restoration work in mid-September. They had removed a large amount of mud and renewed embankment to ensure the stableness and security of the site and its vicinity.
					
					 It is a historic site used by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk to leave her birthplace with her family members aboard a small boat in the spring of Juche 11 (1922) when Korea was under the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.

articles.title: New Cement Assay System Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Cement Assay System Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Researchers of Pyongyang University of Architecture in the DPRK have recently developed a quick cement assay system helpful to raising the quality and production of cement.
					 According to Han Chol Sun, section chief of the university, the new assay system can precisely estimate the hardness of cement in a short time.
					
					 The introduction of the system to the Sunchon Cement Complex and other cement producers showed that its analysis accuracy is over 90 percent.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Sinuiju
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Performs in Sinuiju
Sinuiju, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup is making its performance tour of Sinuiju City of North Phyongan Province from October 19.
					 Among the audience were workers of the Rakwon Machine Complex, the Sinuiju Shoes Factory and the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory, agricultural workers of Jongju City, Ryongchon, Kwaksan and other counties and working people and officials in Sinuiju.
					
					 The performance began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". When female solo and pangchang immortal famous work "Where Are You, Dear General?" was put on the stage, the audience were full of boundless yearning for leader Kim Jong Il. Put on the stage were also female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and female duet "His Humanity" impressively depicting deep reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Light music "Higher and Faster", tap dance "Young Days" and folk dances pleased the audience.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Spring Waters Listed as Natural Monuments
articles.content:
Spring Waters Listed as Natural Monuments
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Masikryong and Taehwabong spring waters, now popular among citizens of the DPRK, have been recently listed as natural monuments of the country.
					 The Masikryong Spring Water gushes out from the bottom of a mountain standing opposite to the skiing course of Masikryong Ski Resort in Kangwon Province.
					
					 This mildly alkaline water, found in August 2013, is 8.5 degrees Celsius in temperature and 7.2 in pH value. It is good for human health and longevity as it contains calcium, kalium and other mineral matters and its degree of association is low.
					
					 The Taehwabong Spring Water discovered in 1974 is also a health drink with high medicinal value.
					
					 Its temperature is 9.5 degrees Celsius and its yield per hour 3-3.2 cubic meters. It is also mildly alkaline water, 7.2 in pH value.
					
					 This water contains kalium, sodium, calcium, magnesium and other mineral matters and it is good for the promotion of digestion and prevention of aging.

articles.title: National Costume Developing in DPRK
articles.content:
National Costume Developing in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Many tailor shops in the DPRK strive to develop the national costume.
					 Among them is the Moranbong District Combined Tailor Shop in the capital city of Pyongyang, which again won a high appreciation at the recent 14th National Korean Dress Exhibition.
					
					 Employees of the shop have worked hard to better the traditional dresses of various styles and colors and seasonal costumes.
					
					 They recently arranged a sci-tech room and a sample production room at the shop and launched a vigorous technical campaign to invent more designs of new-style dresses suited to Koreans' constitutional characters.
					
					 All clothes made at the shop are very popular among citizens.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Smear Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Smear Campaign against DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of traitors are getting ever more desperate in their smear campaign against the DPRK.
					 They openly reveal their wicked scenario for achieving "unification of social systems" aimed to bring down the ideology and social system in the DPRK by zealously joining the U.S. in its smear campaign against the former advancing under the unfurled banner of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 Almost every day traitor Park spouts a slew of such malignant invective as "suppression" and "awful reality," openly crying out for "ratcheting pressure" on the north over its "human rights" issue.
					
					 She allowed the setting up of the UN "office on human rights in north," a product of the U.S. plot-breeding racket against the DPRK, in Seoul. Not content with this, she railroaded through the "National Assembly" "the bill on human rights in the north," which had been on the shelf for more than a decade in the face of public protest.
					
					 The Park group held even an opening ceremony of the "Human Rights Archives" under the pretext of its full-scale enforcement.
					
					 This was another reckless move to tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK and realize the daydream of achieving "unification of social systems" by building up public opinion on the non-existent "human rights issue" and internationalizing it while escalating politico-military pressure upon it. It was, at the same time, a farce intended to cover up the miserable reality of south Korea, a veritable hell.
					
					 Park is working hard to incite extreme distrust and hostility towards the fellow countrymen in the north and break the revolutionary faith and single-minded unity of the service personnel and people of the DPRK through false propaganda. However, no one will lend an ear to the sheer lies told by the tight-cornered crazy old woman. 
					
					 It is the reality of the DPRK in which independent rights of the popular masses are guaranteed at the highest level and their creative enthusiasm is given full play to rapidly develop the country.
					
					 The on-going rehabilitation drive in the northern part of the country is the campaign to protect the people there and serve them launched by the Workers' Party of Korea which considers the people-first principle as its life and soul.
					
					 Such total dedication to the people as the policy of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people is hard to find in any other country in the world.
					
					 Independent rights and dignity of the toiling masses are unthinkable in south Korea under the rule of Park Geun Hye as it has turned into a tundra of human rights.
					
					 As Park Geun Hye, the worst human rights abuser, remains the boss of Chongwadae, human rights abuses occur one after another in south Korea and south Korean people are seized with extreme uneasiness and horror owing to the hideous unethical crimes baffling human imagination.
					
					 The Park group's flurry of shameless invective is only inviting ridicule and condemnation at home and abroad.
					
					 Her group's smear campaign to justify the anachronistic policy of confrontation and realize the daydream of achieving "unification of social systems" is bound to finally go bust.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will mercilessly annihilate the confrontation maniacs who dare challenge its dignity and social system.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns U.S.-Japan-S. Korea War Confabs
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns U.S.-Japan-S. Korea War Confabs
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces held the 41st meeting of the Military Commission in the U.S. at which they discussed security and military posture on the Korean peninsula and transfer of OPECON. Next day they held a meeting of chairmen of Joint Chiefs of Staff with Japan present at which they agreed to steadily boost "cooperation to cope with the nuclear and missile threat from the north" and "cooperation in security".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 In other words, these were dangerous war confabs to make a preemptive attack on the north a fait accompli with U.S. nuclear strategic assets involved and step up the formation of the triangular military alliance for aggression under the "pretext of coping with the nuclear and missile threat from the north".
					
					 At the 41st meeting of the Military Commission the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces were closeted over the issues of "providing extended deterrence" to south Korea and "substantially strengthening the tailored deterrence strategy" while labeling the DPRK's measures for bolstering up the military capability for self-defense as "provocation".
					
					 What they discussed at the recent war huddle revealed their cynical ploy to carry out the "three-phase tailored deterrence strategy" by massively introducing the U.S. nuclear strategic assets under the pretext of the "nuclear and missile threat from the north".
					
					 The above-said meeting of chairmen of Joint Chiefs of Staff should not be overlooked.
					
					 The meeting held in the U.S. goes to prove that the formation of the triangular military alliance has become a matter of the time, in fact.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the chariot of the triangular military alliance being driven by the U.S. at breakneck speed will screw up the tension on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity, increase the danger of a nuclear war and entail catastrophic consequences.

articles.title: Total Failure of Park Geun Hye Group's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Unavoidable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Total Failure of Park Geun Hye Group's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Unavoidable: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations have been driven into the worst catastrophe and acute tensions are prevailing on the Korean peninsula. This is attributable to the U.S. anachronistic policy of isolating and stifling the DPRK and the reckless moves of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for escalating confrontation with the compatriots, zealously pursuant to the U.S. policy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					
					 If fellow countrymen are prioritized and they pool their efforts, the inter-Korean relations will be improved and the way of dialogue, cooperation, peace and reunification be paved, but if importance is attached to foreign forces and the confrontation with fellow countrymen is being escalated in reliance upon foreign forces, the way of dialogue and cooperation will be closed and mistrust and tensions will fester to bring the situation to the brink of war. This is a bitter lesson taught by the distress-torn history of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities' policy of escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north is bound to go totally bankrupt. This is the historic inevitability.
					
					 The Park group is trying to escape the fate of ruin by more tightly clinging to the coattails of foreign forces though it is being forsaken and censured by the nation, but it is a serious mistake.
					
					 The puppet forces are now getting hell-bent on the moves for escalating the above-said confrontation with a foolish calculation while ignoring the strategic position of the DPRK. This is a ridiculous act of the fools unable to discern the trend of the times.
					
					 No matter how desperately the Park group may try, it can never prevent its policy of confrontation from going totally bankrupt.

articles.title: U.S. Chiefly to Blame for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Chiefly to Blame for Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. warmongers staged the largest-ever joint naval drill in the waters off the Korean peninsula together with south Korean puppet forces despite the unanimous protest at home and abroad. The drill was staged under the pretence of examining the feasibility of the "operation plan for large-scale counteraction" while brass hats of the Command of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea were watching it aboard an aircraft carrier.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. saber-rattling driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase can never be regarded as an ordinary and annual one.
					
					 The main purpose of the naval maneuver staged by the U.S. and its vassal forces is to round off the system for preemptive attack on the DPRK and ignite a war at any cost.
					
					 In other words, the sinister aim sought by the U.S. in bringing strategic assets to south Korea is to escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula and provoke the second Korean war any moment.
					
					 The U.S. is the root cause of escalated tension of the Korean peninsula and cancer-like entity disturbing world peace.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently threatening the DPRK with nuclear strike means while escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula. Under this condition it is natural for the DPRK to steadily bolster up preemptive nuclear attack capability which can pose constant threat to the U.S.
					
					 Military and technical superiority is no longer a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 Gone are days never to return when the U.S. imperialists could threaten the DPRK with nukes. 
					
					 It is the steadfast will of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to write a history of final ruin of the United States of America if the U.S. imperialists ignite a war again.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces Japan for Emerging Dangerous War State
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces Japan for Emerging Dangerous War State
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of launching the latest submarine Seiryu to be inducted into the Maritime "Self-Defense Force" was held at the Kobe Dockyard of Japan recently.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday observes:
					
					 This goes to prove that Japan is attaching great importance to bolstering up submarine capability in increasing its naval force. 
					
					 Japan has dramatically expanded the theater of its SDF activities worldwide, discarding the principle of "exclusive defense." Its main mission is to conduct overseas military activities for aggression, not just to defend its proper.
					
					 Having grown corpulent through the stepped-up moves for turning Japan into a military giant, it is dreaming of becoming a "leader of the world," not just "Asian leader". 
					
					 Japan inflicted tremendous human and material losses upon the Asian people as a war criminal state during the Second World War.
					
					 It is nonsense and mockery at the international community for such country to work hard to expand its military activities while talking about "international peace" and "humanitarianism".
					
					 The world wishes to see Japan take the road of genuine peace, instead of expanding military activities, and opt for redressing its past crimes as its first step.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that Japan is bound to meet destruction as it keeps to the road of a war despite the demand of the international community, blinded with ambition for militarist overseas expansion. 
					
					 It is not war but peace that guarantees Japan's existence and future. The war will push Japan to its final destruction.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to heed the warning of the international community and stop at once its suicidal action.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Distortion of History Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Distortion of History Slammed
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Situation Measure Council of the Council of Christian Churches of south Korea issued a declaration on the situation on Oct. 20 in protest against the puppet authorities' moves to distort the history, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 In the declaration the organization denounced Park Geun Hye for distorting the history as evidenced by its act of diminishing the meaning of the anti-Japanese independence movement of the Korean nation including the March First Movement.
					
					 It noted that the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was not the one which the government should have done in disregard of victims.
					
					 It urged the authorities to retract the system of introducing "state-compiled history textbooks" and nullify the humiliating "agreement" with Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party's Offensive of "Coloring Theory" Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party's Offensive of "Coloring Theory" Slammed
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Mun Jae In, former representative of the Minju Party of south Korea, issued an article on Oct. 23 denouncing the "Saenuri Party" for its offensive of "coloring theory", according to south Korean CBS.
					 The article said that the ruling party attacked the opposition camp as regards an article written by the former minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, adding that its real intention is the clumsy "coloring theory" to cover up power-backed scandals as in case of "Choe Sun Sil Gate".

articles.title: S. Korean People Demand Park Geun Hye's Impeachment
articles.content:
S. Korean People Demand Park Geun Hye's Impeachment
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on October 22 demanded Park Geun Hye's impeachment.
					 The editorial said south Korean people are strongly demanding the impeachment of Park Geun Hye for ceaseless disclosure of scandals.
					
					 It noted that the Seoul mayor called for impeaching Park Geun Hye for working out a blacklist of persons of literature and arts.
					
					 It said that the civic and public circles formed citizens' solidarity of the Committee for Promoting Park Geun Hye's Impeachment and they are escalating the struggle and the Confederation of Trade Unions has joined in the action chanting slogan "Let's put an end to Park Geun Hye regime."
					
					 It noted that the present reality of south Korea is the worst-ever one caused by violation of democracy, corruption and incompetence and deterioration of people's living.

articles.title: Signature Campaign Starts in S. Korea to Probe Truth about Brutal Suppression of Paek Nam Gi
articles.content:
Signature Campaign Starts in S. Korea to Probe Truth about Brutal Suppression of Paek Nam Gi
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of Struggle for Paek Nam Gi in south Korea kicked off a signature campaign for introducing a special inspection to probe the truth about violence against peasant Paek Nam Gi and punish those responsible for his death from Oct. 16, according to a south Korean online paper.
					 The bereaved family and the headquarters held a press conference at the hospital of Seoul National University on Oct. 16 at which they declared the start of the 200 000-people signature campaign for introducing a special inspection to probe the truth about violence against peasant Paek Nam Gi.
					
					 At the press conference Paek Minjuhwa, daughter of Paek Nam Gi, called for ensuring the passage of the bill on special inspection through the "National Assembly".

articles.title: Actions for Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Reunification Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- There took place the 2016 meeting of culture for reunification in Phaju, Kyonggi Province, south Korea on Oct. 22 under the sponsorship of the All-People Consultative Council for National Reconciliation in south Korea, according to the south Korean on-line paper Tongil News.
					Present there were at least 1,000 inhabitants of all social standings.
					
					 They called for waging a dynamic struggle with the will that everyone will certainly carry out what he or she can do despite pain for the day of reunification when the south and the north will become one amid the cheers and applauses of the nation.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Censured by S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Censured by S. Korean Paper
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo in an article on Oct. 20 slammed the Park Geun Hye regime.
					 The article recalled that the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty recently published an appeal calling for overthrowing the Park regime which responded to the death of peasant Paek Nam Gi in a dictatorial manner, adding that the resentment of civic and public organizations and the people at the regime has gone beyond the danger line.
					
					 All people acknowledge that Paek Nam Gi was killed by water cannon but only the Park regime is misrepresenting the cause of his death, feigning ignorance of it, and trying to make an autopsy, the article deplored. 
					
					 All people are branding this attitude of the regime as the height of unethical crimes and turning out in the actions for its resignation, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 Experts hold that south-north cooperation is the only way for weathering the present structural crisis, urging the regime to pay heed to their voices.

articles.title: Pusan Metro Trade Unions Stages Strike
articles.content:
Pusan Metro Trade Unions of S. Korea Stages Strike
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Metro Trade Union of south Korea staged a strike on Oct. 21 demanding the puppet authorities retract the introduction of the system for paying wages according to piece rate, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 On Oct. 20, there took place the last negotiations on the above-said introduction between the trade union and the business side.
					
					 Owing to the wrong attitude of the business, the negotiations broke down.
					
					 Upset by this, the members of the trade union went on the strike again next day to achieve the right to existence.

articles.title: Russian Body Praises Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Russian Body Praises Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia posted an article on its website on Oct. 17.
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, leader of Korea, is the head of state, the youngest in the present times.
					
					 His spirit of at a go is drawing attention of the international community.
					
					 It is his qualities to finish anything off at a go, in a sweeping way.
					
					 The DPRK has brought about eye-opening changes at an astonishing speed in less than 5 years since he emerged as its leader.
					
					 Architecture alone bears testimony to the said facts.
					
					 The Munsu Water Park, Masikryong Ski Resort, Songdowon International Children's Camp, Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School, Okryu Children's Hospital, Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, Yonphung Scientists Holiday Camp, Mirae Scientists Street, Sci-Tech Complex and many other edifices were built at the highest level in a short span of time under the intention and guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, changing the looks of modern Korea.
					
					 His spirit of at a go is the staunch one of charge that is free of existing formula and theory and races against time.
					
					 The DPRK which is changing its looks day and night will hold a position of a power in every aspect, not to mention economic giant and highly civilized nation, before long.

articles.title: Cuban Newspaper Praises Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuban Newspaper Praises Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Cuban newspaper Granma carried an article on Oct. 11.
					 The article noted that the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was splendidly celebrated in the DPRK.
					
					 Saying President Kim Il Sung founded the WPK and developed it into a mass party that has taken roots deep among the broad masses, the article went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung's cause was creditably carried forward by Comrade Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il strengthened the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party that can dynamically lead socialist construction.
					
					 The DPRK turned into a prosperous socialist state with a strong sense of independence under the guidance of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK with over 70 years of history is now wisely leading the Korean people in their struggle for building a socialist power in any harsh conditions and circumstances and the people absolutely support and follow the WPK.

articles.title: Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Serves as Guidelines for Accomplishing World Cause of Socialism: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Serves as Guidelines for Accomplishing World Cause of Socialism: Swiss Bodies
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the eternal guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), serves as immortal guidelines for accomplishing the world cause of socialism.
					 The Swiss Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Oct. 6.
					
					 The statement praised President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building and leading the Party.
					
					 It said that Marshal Kim Jong Un underlined the need to develop the WPK into the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party at the 7th Congress of the WPK.
					
					 Therefore, the Party's leadership role in the revolution and construction has been further strengthened and a sure guarantee for accomplishing the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism has been provided, it pointed out.
					
					 The WPK will build a powerful socialist country and reunify the country without fail under the unfurled banner of independence, Songun and socialism.

articles.title: Brazilian Body Urges U.S. to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
articles.content:
Brazilian Body Urges U.S. to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "DPRK Tames U.S." on its website on Oct. 5.
					 The article said that the DPRK opted to possess nukes and bolster up its nuclear deterrence to cope with the U.S. threat which lasted for more than half a century and that thanks to its successful first H-bomb test, it emerged as a nuclear giant. It went on:
					
					 The U.S., which has resorted to the moves to threaten the DPRK with nukes, is now shocked by the nuclear weapons and missiles of the DPRK. This is the reality of the prevailing situation.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Un is hitting the "metal material" called Obama with his "iron hammer" to make it a thing he wants to make.
					
					 In such situation what is the way out for the U.S.?
					
					 It has already imposed all sanctions on the DPRK and war may lead to the ruin of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. has no option but to have dialogue with the DPRK and withdraw its forces from Northeast Asia.
					
					 American politicians, who made it a habit to resort to high-handed and arbitrary practices, had better realize that it is realistic and wise to do so.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza difamacion de Kerry sobre la RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza difamacion de Kerry sobre la RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el secretario de Estado norteamericano incurrio en el acto verbal provocativo de difamar el poder de la muy digna Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 25 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 21, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Kerry se atrevio a calificar a nuestro pais de "poder ilegal e ilegitimo".
					
					Desde el primer dia de su desempeno, el viene calumniando siniestramente a nuestro pais usando expresiones como "Estado bribon" y "antro del mal".
					
					Sin dejar ese vicio, sigue hablando mal hasta ahora cuando se acerca el fin de su mandato. 
					
					Su chismografia no pasa de ser el suspiro de quien esta desesperado por el fracaso total de su politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Kerry y otros compinches de Obama son gangsteres ilegales e ilegitimos que por doquier del mundo, derrocan con fuerzas armadas los gobiernos legitimos de Estados soberanos que no les agradan y asesinan a decenas de miles de personas inocentes.
					
					Si no hubiera existido EE.UU. gobernado por los bribones politicos como Kerry, el mundo habria sido muy tranquilo y bueno para vivir, esto es la evaluacion unanime de la abrumadora mayoria de los pueblos de este planeta.
					
					Aunque la camarilla de Obama se obstine en tildar de ilegal a la RPDC, no podra destruir la posicion estrategica de esta que demuestra a todo el mundo su aspecto digno y gallardo con la unidad monolitica y el inagotable poderio nacional.
					
					Diga lo que diga Kerry, avanzaremos a pasos firmes por la senda que ya hemos escogido.

articles.title: Registradas 2 fuentes como nuevos patrimonios naturales
articles.content:
Registradas 2 fuentes como nuevos patrimonios naturales
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, las aguas manantiales Masikryong y Taehwabong se registraron como patrimonios naturales de Corea.
					Las aguas Masikryong brotan al pie del monte al frente de la pista de esqui en la cordillera de igual nombre.
					
					Fueron descubiertas en agosto de 2013 por los constructores del campo de esqui. Su temperatura es 8.5oC y su pH, 7.2.
					
					Contienen equilibradamente las sustancias minerales como calcio y potasio. Tienen buen sabor y son provechosas para la salud y longevidad.
					
					La fuente Taehwabong, descubierta en 1974, tambien muestra notables efectos medicinales.
					
					Su temperatura es 9.5oC y la erupcion se calcula en 3 - 3.2 metros cubicos por hora. Su valor de pH es 7.2.
					
					Sus componentes son el potasio, el sodio, el calcio, el magnesio y otros elementos que fomentan la digestion y previene el envejecimiento.
					
					Ambas fuentes contribuyen a la vida y al fomento de salud de los habitantes.

articles.title: Desarrollado nuevo sistema analitico de cemento
articles.content:
Desarrollado nuevo sistema analitico de cemento
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, los investigadores de la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang desarrollaron el nuevo sistema de analisis rapido de cemento que permitira aumentar la produccion asegurando la alta calidad.
					De acuerdo con el jefe de seccion de la Universidad, Han Chol Sun, el sistema fue aplicado en el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon y otras empresas de produccion del mismo material donde se pudo evaluar en breve la dureza de cemento con una exactitud superior al 90%.

articles.title: Campana anti-RPDC sera fracasada sin falta: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Campana anti-RPDC sera fracasada sin falta: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye recrudece la campana intrigante anti-RPDC.
					Siendo complice de la conspiracion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC que avanza bajo la bandera de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, expone abiertamente su siniestra ambicion de la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes", encaminada a eliminar la idea y el regimen de la parte connacional.
					
					Casi todos los dias, Park Geun-hye critica a la RPDC hablando de la supuesta "represion" y "situacion tragica" y jurando "intensificar la presion" con el problema de "derechos humanos".
					
					Introdujo ya en Seul la "Oficina de Derechos Humanos del Norte" de la ONU, producto de la campana intrigante anti-RPDC de EE.UU., y aprobo forzosamente la "ley de derechos humanos del Norte" cuya adopcion estuvo suspendida por mas de 10 anos debido al fuerte rechazo de distintos sectores.
					
					Anunciando la ejecucion activa de esa ley, celebro el acto inaugural de la "oficina de conservacion de registros de DDHH".
					
					Esto deviene otra locura para internacionalizar y polemizar mas, al paralelo de la presion politico-militar, el inexistente "problema de DDHH" y manchar asi la digna imagen de la RPDC. Tambien resulta nueva payasada para ocultar la realidad tragica del Sur de Corea, tierra infernal.
					
					Aunque la traidora Park pretende sembrar en el Sur de Corea la extremada desconfianza y hostilidad a la parte connacional y debilitar la conviccion revolucionaria y unidad monolitica de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, nadie prestara oidos a su palabreria absurda.
					
					En la RPDC se garantizan en maximo nivel los derechos independientes de las masas populares que trabajan con creciente creatividad para el desarrollo vertiginoso del pais.
					
					La campana de resarcimiento de danos en el extremo norte de la RPDC deviene la batalla para defender y servir al pueblo que libra nuestro partido que lo considera como ente mas valioso.
					
					No se puede buscar en ninguna parte de este planeta tal politica de apreciar, respetar y amar al pueblo.
					
					En contraste, en el Sur de Corea no se puede discutir la soberania ni la dignidad de las masas trabajadoras debido a la gobernacion infame de Park Geun-hye y la sociedad surcoreana se va convirtiendo dia a dia en la tierra sin derechos humanos.
					
					Durante el mandato de esa violadora no. 1 de DDHH, se reportan uno tras otro inimaginables crimenes antieticos que desatan panico e inquietud entre la poblacion.
					
					Por eso, la palabreria de ella y sus compinches causa solamente la condena y burla de nacionales y extranjeros.
					
					Esta condenada al fracaso total la campana de la horda de Park que justifica su anacronica politica de confrontacion y trata de realizar el sueno de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo eliminaran sin piedad a los fanaticos de enfrentamiento que desafian atrevidamente a nuestra dignidad y regimen.

articles.title: Minju Joson advierte sobre el surgimiento de Japon como Estado belico
articles.content:
Minju Joson advierte sobre el surgimiento de Japon como Estado belico
Pyongyang, 25 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, tuvo lugar en el Astillero de Kobe de Japon la ceremonia de botadura del submarino ultramoderno Seiryu a ser entregado a las "Fuerzas Maritimas de Autodefensa". 
					Este hecho insinua que Japon concede gran importancia a la ampliacion de la capacidad de submarinos en el fortalecimiento de sus fuerzas navales.
					
					Revela asi Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					Al revocar el principio de "defensa exclusiva", el pais isleno extendio a la esfera mundial el teatro de actividades de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y modifico la mision principal de este cuerpo armado desde la defensa del territorio nacional a las operaciones militares en ultramar de caracter agresivo. 
					
					Como resultado del largo proceso de conversion en potencia militar, Japon se ha fortalecido sobremanera en el plano militar y suena ahora con hacerse no solo el "dueno de Asia" sino "el del mundo entero". 
					
					El pais criminal de la Segunda Guerra Mundial causo enormes perdidas humanas y materiales a los pueblos asiaticos. 
					
					Sin embargo, pretende ampliar las actividades militares hablando de la "paz internacional" y el "humanitarismo", lo cual es pretexto absurdo y burla a la sociedad internacional. 
					
					El mundo exige fuertemente que Japon opte por el pacifismo verdadero, en lugar de la ampliacion de actividades militares, y liquide primero sus crimenes del pasado. 
					
					Si Japon sigue emprendiendo el camino de guerra abrigando la ambicion militarista de expansion a ultramar y despreciando la demanda de la sociedad internacional, sufrira el arruinamiento definitivo. 
					
					La existencia y el futuro del pais isla no estan en la guerra, sino en la paz. 
					
					Japon debe dejarse de actos suicidas teniendo presente esa advertencia de la sociedad internacional.
